actions: Nourishes Yin, moistens the Lungs, clears Heat, clears the Heart and calms the Spirit.
With Zhi Mu, for Irritability and mental disorientation due to Yin Deficiency or lingering Heat in the late stages of febrile disease
Clears Heat, drains Fire, clears Heat from the Qi Stage, from the Lungs and from the Stomach.

syndromes: Late-stage or aftermath of Ying or Xue Stage Heat with improper purging damaging Stomach Qi
Bai He Bing (Lily Syndrome) with pronounced Upper Jiao symptoms

symptoms: Does not know what he/she wants
A bitter taste in the mouth
manifestations.pulse: Slightly rapid or Weak and rapid or Thready and rapid

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with Excess Fire in the Lungs and Heart.
Contraindicated for those with Yin Deficiency as the main pathology.
